Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE FUNCTION EvaluatePermissionPropertyValue_ExplicitlyDefined ( @type VARCHAR(32), @propdef_id CHAR(32), @itemtype_id CHAR(32), @identity_list VARCHAR(MAX) ) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( SELECT MAX (CASE WHEN ( (acs.can_update = '1' OR value_permission_behavior = N'no_check') AND @type = 'can_update' ) THEN 9 -- can_update permissions only WHEN ( (acs.can_get = '1' OR value_permission_behavior = N'no_check') AND @type = 'can_get' ) THEN 9 -- can_delete permissions only WHEN ( (acs.can_change_access = '1' OR value_permission_behavior = N'no_check') AND @type = 'can_change_access' ) THEN 9 -- can_change_access permissions only ELSE NULL -- No permissions on specified for specified access right END) p FROM (SELECT acs.can_get, acs.can_update, acs.can_change_access, value_permission_behavior FROM [ITEMTYPE_XPROPERTYDEFINITION] as it_xpd LEFT OUTER JOIN [ACCESS_PROPERTYVALUE] acs ON it_xpd.value_permission_behavior <> N'no_check' AND acs.SOURCE_ID = it_xpd.value_permission_id WHERE it_xpd.[related_id] = @propdef_id AND it_xpd.[source_id] = @itemtype_id AND (it_xpd.value_permission_behavior = N'no_check' OR CHARINDEX(acs.[related_id] COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2, @identity_list) > 0) ) acs )
Item.name: EvaluatePermissionPropertyValue_ExplicitlyDefined
